activities: Thunderhead Inc. processes personal information which belongs to our customers as a data processor when carrying out our software-as-a-service operations for our customers.  In this context, our customers determine the purposes for which and the manner in which the personal information is processed.  Thunderhead Inc. processes personal information as a data controller for our own internal business operations.  For certain software products, Thunderhead Inc. will undertake processing in both capacities.  The purposes for which Thunderhead Inc. will process personal information as a data controller include: staff administration; advertising, marketing, and public relations; advertising, marketing, and public relations on behalf of customers; accounts and records; consultancy and advisory services; and information and databank administration.  In this context, Thunderhead Inc. determines the purposes for which and the manner in which the personal information is processed.
recoursemech: Thunderhead Inc. has selected EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to investigate unresolved complaints.
